name: You're In The Band
description:
The basic elements of a game created for GBAJam 5 (and potentially expanded on in the future).

You're In The Band is about you, a musician, trying to make their way up in the world by creating a band and playing concerts. Watch your reputation grow with each successful concert and even NPCs respond to your slowly-growing popularity. In this basic version, you can name yourself, choose an instrument, pick from a few various sprites to represent yourself, and play the first-level song. There are no save feature as of yet.
